articles.author: Chloe Taylor
articles.title: Mining stocks rise after reports of Glencore, Rio Tinto merger talks; European markets resume rally - CNBC
articles.description: European markets opened in positive territory on Friday, setting the region’s stocks up for a weekly rise.
articles.content:
European markets opened in positive territory on Friday, setting the region's stocks up for a weekly rise following one of the best trading sessions in four months on Wednesday.
